definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The numerical simulation for fire environment of PLG tank is studied.
sentences.chinese: 對液化氣儲罐的火災環境的數值模擬研究。

sentences.english: Liquefied gas formula being hit by a combustion in air?
sentences.chinese: 液化氣在空氣中燃燒的化學式？

sentences.english: This thesis is a sub-system of the risk assessment of LPG carrier.
sentences.chinese: 本文是液化氣船風險評估的一個子系統。

sentences.english: The production of cold involves the production of liquefied gases.
sentences.chinese: 冷量生產涉及到液化氣的生產。
